dataset.title: Microbial community 16S rRNA from Fram Strait water samples PS85 2014

creator.organizationName: Max Planck Institute for Marine Microbiology

metadataProvider.organizationName: Max Planck Institute for Marine Microbiology

abstract.para: Several depths of the full water column of two stations (HGIV and N4) were sequenced in order to correlate the communities of the Fram Strait water column at HAUSGARTEN with benthic communities. DNA from CTD samples was extracted and the v3v4 region of the 16S rRNA was sequenced with Illumina MiSeq.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial (CC-BY) 4.0 License.

contact.organizationName: Max Planck Institute for Marine Microbiology

samplingDescription.para: Several depths of the full water column of two stations (HGIV and N4) were sequenced in order to correlate the communities of the Fram Strait water column at HAUSGARTEN with benthic communities. DNA from CTD samples was extracted and the v3v4 region of the 16S rRNA was sequenced with Illumina MiSeq.

project.title: Microbial community 16S rRNA from Fram Strait water samples PS85 2014
